Quotes: The faster you go, the shorter you are.
Author: Albert Einstein

Quotes: The process of scientific discovery is, in effect, a continual flight from wonder.
Author: Albert Einstein

Quotes: If we knew what it was we were doing, it would not be called research, would it?
Author: Albert Einstein

Quotes: Intellectuals solve problems, geniuses prevent them.
Author: Albert Einstein

Quotes: Realists do not fear the results of their study.
Author: Fiodor Mihailovici Dostoevski

Quotes: No man is clever enough to know all the evil he does.
Author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

Quotes: You may try but you can never imagine what it is to have a man's form of genius in you, and to suffer the slavery of being a girl.
Author: George Eliot

Quotes: Irregularity and want of method are only supportable in men of great learning or genius, who are often too full to be exact, and therefore they choose to throw down their pearls in heaps before the reader, rather than be at the pains of stringing them.
Author: Joseph Addison

Quotes: Thousands of geniuses live and die undiscovered - either by themselves or by others.
Author: Mark Twain

Quotes: I have nothing to declare except my genius.
Author: Oscar Wilde
